name: Slug In Heat
description:
• The Sun is Slug's enemy - if Slug travels too far from water they dry out.
  • Slug may be slow, but they will not give up until they win over Snail's heart.

LOWREZJAM 2022 - chosen theme: The Sun Is Your Enemy

The game is an awkward platformer type. The dark souls of Slug games with a satisfying ending.

When you finish the game, see how you rank against other players best times through the Main Menu > Highscores.
